text.en:
1 Psychic Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner Psychic monsters
You can target 1 banished monster; Special Summon it to your field. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 monster from your GY, then target 1 other face-up monster on the field; banish it, then gain LP equal to the banished monster's original ATK. You can only use 1 "Psychic Blaster Mk-II" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

materials: 1 Psychic-Type Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner Psychic-Type monsters
